articles.title: Cough analysis app could detect COVID-19 by sound alone - AppleInsider
articles.description: Researchers at MIT have used machine learning to create software capable of detecting whether a person has caught COVID-19 by analyzing their cough, a development that could eventually result in an iPhone app for daily checks.
